ResetGameMessage: Are you sure you want to reset? All progress will be lost.
ConfirmQuit: Quit the game and return to the main menu?
ShopPrompt: USE LEGO STUDS TO UPGRADE YOUR VEHICLE!
DCLegalLines: BATMAN and all related characters and elements & Forestry Games.
LegoLegalLines: Forestry Games Ltd. All Rights Reserved
StoryPage1: A QUIET NIGHT IN GOTHAM CITY IS TORN APART BY THE SOUND OF AN EXPLOSION
StoryPage2: VILLAINS OF GOTHAM CITY HAVE ESCAPED FROM ARKHAM ASYLUM AND ARE RACING AWAY!
StoryPage3: THE BAT-SIGNAL LIGHTS UP THE SKY OF GOTHAM AND BRUCE WAYNE SPRINGS INTO ACTION.
StoryPage4: HELP BATMAN DEFEAT THE VILLAINS AND SEND THEM BACK TO ARKHAM ASYLUM!
healthDescription: Increases the amount of health you start with
studDescription: Increases the value of LEGO studs when collected
magnetDescription: Reduces the number of LEGO bricks needed to spawn a Magnet
rocketBoosterDescription: Reduces the number of LEGO bricks needed to spawn a Rocket Booster
homingRocketDescription: Reduces the number of LEGO bricks needed to spawn a Homing Rocket
